text: Maharaja Theme Park is an amusement park located in Neelambur, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. The park also has movie screens attached with the park. It was opened to the public in April 2006. Tamil Actor surya opened this theme park. == References == Category:Amusement parks in Tamil Nadu Category:Tourist attractions in Coimbatore Category:2006 establishments in India
title: Maharaja Theme Park
